Alert Name: bush
Renewable fuel standards issued for cars
New standards aim to cut dependence on foreign oil and curb global warming, but does not regulate greenhouse gases.
04/10/07 07:11 PM, EDT
The United States announced new standards for renewable fuels for cars and trucks Tuesday, but stopped short of committing to regulate greenhouse gases that spur global warming.
